com.pump.animation.quicktime

Class JPEGMovWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.animation.quicktime.MovWriter
      • com.pump.animation.quicktime.JPEGMovWriter

  • public class JPEGMovWriter
extends MovWriter
    A MovWriter that encodes frames as a series of JPEG images.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_QUALITY

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_QUALITY
        This property is used to determine the JPG image quality. It is a float between [0, 1], where 1 is a lossless image. This value should be the key in a key/value pair in the Map passed to addFrame(..).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JPEGMovWriter

        public JPEGMovWriter(java.io.File file,
                     float defaultQuality)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        file - the destination file to write to.
        defaultQuality - the default JPEG quality (from [0,1]) to use if a frame is added without otherwise specifying this value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addFrame

        public void addFrame(float duration,
                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                     float jpegQuality)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Add an image to this animation using a specific jpeg compression quality.
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration (in seconds) of this frame
        bi - the image to add
        jpegQuality - a value from [0,1] indicating the quality of this image. A value of 1 represents a losslessly encoded image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeFrame

        protected void writeFrame(java.io.OutputStream out,

      • addFrames

        public void addFrames(AnimationReader r,
                      javax.swing.ProgressMonitor monitor)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Add all the frames from an AnimationReader.
        Parameters:
        r - the animation to read.
        monitor - an optional ProgressMonitor to update
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs copying frames.
